settings.content:
Resellers & Distributors

Partner with BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls®

Are you looking to offer a unique, eco-friendly golf product in your market?

We’re actively seeking distributors, resellers, and franchise partners in these international markets, including:

  • Germany
  • United Kingdom
  • Australia
  • Maldives
  • And others! Reach out to find more info.

BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls® are in-demand worldwide as more golfers, resorts, and businesses look for eco friendly outdoor activities.

We offer wholesale pricing, distributor opportunities, and drop shipping.

Why Partner with Us?

✔ Exclusive Distributor Pricing – Competitive margins for resellers
✔ Drop Shipping Available – No need for inventory; we fulfill orders for you
✔ Sustainable & Unique Product – A high-demand product in the golf industry
✔ Franchise Opportunities – Expand BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls® in your country

Get Started Today

If you’re interested in reselling, distribution, or franchising, we’d love to hear from you. Contact us for more details on pricing, exclusivity, and how we can work together.
